did.unittitle: University of Michigan Assorted Videotapes 1981-2005, 1991-2000
did.abstract: Artificially constructed collection of University of Michigan videotapes received from a variety of sources. Videotapes, mainly in VHS format, of University of Michigan events, symposiums, panel discussions, interviews, outreach and public service announcements as well as network news depictions featuring the University of Michigan. Includes Gerald R. Ford School of Public Policy ground breaking and naming, Arthur Miller symposium, MLK Day events, and Y2K public service announcements.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was assembled from various sources.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan with the exception of network broadcast content.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, University of Michigan Assorted Videotapes, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

processinfo.p: [Delete this set of tags if not needed for digital material processing]

bioghist.p: This collection was assembled by the Bentley Library from various University Departments and individuals.

scopecontent.p: Artificially constructed collection of University of Michigan videotapes received from a variety of sources. Videotapes, mainly in VHS format, of University of Michigan events, symposiums, panel discussions, interviews, outreach and public service announcements as well as network news depictions featuring the University of Michigan. Includes Gerald R. Ford School of Public Policy ground breaking and naming, Arthur Miller symposium, MLK Day events, and Y2K public service announcements. The videos are arranged into of four series: Events, Interviews, Outreach and U-M Produced Videos, and News Depictions of U-M. Unless otherwise indicated, all items are in the VHS format.

Outreach and U-M Produced Videos 1991-2002

scopecontent.p: Outreach and U-M Produced Videos, 1991-2002 (1.0 linear foot), arranged alphabetically, includes videos officially produced by the University of Michigan. These include videos produced to educate the University community and videos produced for public outreach. Of particular interest are videos relating to education on Y2K (Year 2000) compliance. Y2K videos include 3 public service announcements (PSAs) including the master 1 inch tapes of each PSA.

News Depictions of U-M 1985-2003

scopecontent.p: News Depictions of U-M, 1985-2003 (0.5 linear feet), arranged alphabetically, includes recordings of public news services depictions of the University of Michigan. The bulk of the series relates to the debates surrounding affirmative action.
